General.Name: Makmur Berkah Amanda Pt
General.Description: PT Makmur Berkah Amanda Tbk, together with its subsidiary, operates as a real estate developer in Indonesia. It operates in three segments: Finished Warehouse, Rental, and Hospitality. The company's development portfolio comprises residential, commercial, warehouse, and industrial properties. It also operates a hotel under the Hotel Element By Westin name. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Jakarta Barat, Indonesia. PT Makmur Berkah Amanda Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Griya Prima Amanda.
General.Address: APL Tower,Unit OT/35/T5 Podomoro City, Jakarta Barat, Indonesia, 11470
